ygData.subject: Re: where to get the gate spell
ygData.msgSnippet: You get the gate spell at the cliric guild. Thats where I got it. ... From: Jaded  To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
You get the gate spell at the cliric guild. Thats where I got it.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jaded <jaded@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, May 07, 1999 9:24 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Another Spell request


>From: "Jaded" <jaded@...>
>
>
>Anyone know a vendor in Queynos who'll sell to a young Necro? I need Gate.
>Can't find anyone in the PlagueBringer's Temple, and none of the above
>ground mages will sell to me. I didn't try the Temple of Light honestly,
>since I assumed I'd be KOS in there.
>
>Loving this class. I took a Gnoll Watcher at level 4. Both my shaman and
>rogue characters would've been chewed up and spit out if they tried to do
>that...
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>What's "Grow to Give"?
>http://www.onelist.com
>It's a new incentive program at ONElist. See homepage for details.
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>
